thread.title: Anti immigration party calls for new Somali PM to be stripped of his Norwegian passport
thread.title_full: Anti immigration party calls for new Somali PM to be stripped of his Norwegian passport

author: David Millward
title: Anti immigration party calls for new Somali PM to be stripped of his Norwegian passport
text:
Anti immigration party calls for new Somali PM to be stripped of his Norwegian passport Somalia's newly appointed Prime Minister Hassan Ali Khaire Credit: AFP David Millward 25 February 2017 • 1:58am 
S omalia's newly-appointed prime minister should be stripped of the Norwegian passport he has held since coming to the country as a refugee. 
The anti-immigration Progress Party is objecting to Hassan Ali Khaire holding dual nationality, The Local reported. 
Whereas the overwhelming majority of countries in Europe allow dual nationality, including the rest of Scandinavia, it is outlawed in Norway. 
Mr Khaire, 46, arrived in Norway in the late 1980s and was able to become a dual national because Somalis are exempt from the ban. 
M azyar Keshvari, the Progress Party’s immigration spokesman, said Mr Khaire's appointment as prime minister meant he should surrender his passport. 
“He should be deprived of his Norwegian passport,” Mr Keshvari told Norwegian broadcaster NRK. 
“A country's prime minister cannot have multiple nationalities. If conflicts occur, where they will their loyalties lie? 
“When someone has been appointed a Member of Parliament and even the Prime Minister of Somalia, we have to assume that they are Somali nationals,” he said. 
“The fact that he has now become Prime Minister clearly shows that his need for protection should be seen as temporary and not permanent in nature.” Follow Telegraph News
